channel.title: NPC's spawn twice
channel.description:
Hey Moparscapers, Ive recently added a bunch of NPC's in my server but they seem to spawn twice. Have any of you encountered a problem with this before, if so how did you manage to fix this? Thanks In Advance,
~Zofis

item.title: NPC's spawn twice
item.dc:creator: @neverlost neverlost
item.description:
@neverlost wrote:

you must have the same npc in the npc files twice, search it, that can be your only problem.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's spawn twice
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

Ok, I dont have 2 npcspawn files, I dont have the same npc twice and it only does that to the npc’s Ive reccently added so those three are out of the question :S

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's spawn twice
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Check to see if your npcHandler has anything to do with it. Otherwise, you’re putting in the same npc twice in your autospawn.cfg. Or maybe you have 2 autospawn.cfgs.

Read full topic
